ARABIC: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: the Day the Trumpet is blown and you come in droves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day the trumpet blast is sounded you will come in hordes;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: the Day when the Trumpet shall be blown, and you will come forth in multitudes;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On that day the trumpet will be sounded and you will come (to Us) in huge groups.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The day when the Trumpet will be blown – you will therefore come forth in multitudes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The Day when the Trumpet will be blown, and you shall come forth in crowds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The day on which the trumpet shall be blown so you shall come forth in hosts,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: the day the Trumpet is blown, and you shall come in troops,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A day when the trumpet is blown and ye come in multitudes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On that Day when the trumpet shall be sounded, you shall come in droves,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It is a Day whereon the trumpet will be blown, and ye will come in multitudes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: the day the Trumpet will be blown, and you will come in groups,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Day that the Trumpet shall be sounded, and ye shall come forth in crowds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The Day when the Trumpet will be blown, and you shall come forth in crowds (groups);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: the Day that the Horn is blown, and you shall come in crowds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The Day when the Trumpet is blown, and you will come in droves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:18] the day the Trumpet, the Horn, is blown (yawma yunfakhu fī’l-sūri is either a substitution for, or an explication of, yawma’l-fasli, ‘the Day of Decision’, the blower being Isrāfīl) and you come, forth from your graves to the site [of the Resurrection], in droves, in diverse groups,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (A day when the trumpet is blown) the blowing of the resurrection, (and ye come in multitudes) host after 723 host and group after group,
